com.pokerface.pokerapi.users

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pokerface.pokerapi.users.UserController

  • @RequestMapping(value="/api/v1/users")
 @RestController
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    UserController exists to map the communication from the Front End to the UserService where appropriate. This handles the communication of log ins, and registration, ensuring to communicate proper Transport objects to the user.

        @PostMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserTransport> register(@RequestBody
                                                                                     RegistrationFields fields)
        register handles the mapping of the registration of a user, taking the fields they've submitted and passing them along to UserService to parse
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the response, if it was successful or not

public UserTransport update(@RequestBody

        Returns:
